ordersText.title: FAITHFUL ADVANCE
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, you may move up to 2 of your units through 1 uncontrolled world as if it were a friendly area. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: DIVINE DELIVERANCE
ordersText.general: When rolling dice during the preparation step of a combat you start with this order, roll 1 additional die for each Sister Repentia on the contested world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: LEAD THE RIGHTEOUS
ordersText.general: After you resolve this order, you may place 1 reinforcement token on a friendly world in the active system that contains a bastion and no reinforcement token. When this world becomes contested, this reinforcement token participates in combat, but is not treated as a unit during the reinforce step. If the bastion is destroyed outside of combat, return the reinforcement token to the supply. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: WAR HYMNS
ordersText.general: During this orbital strike, gain 1 [D]. Before you resolve this orbital strike, if the combined morale of your ships participating in this orbital strike is higher than the combined morale of unrouted units and bastions on the world, force your opponent to rout any unit that suffers damage during this orbital strike. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: BRAZIER OF HOLY FIRE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may rout any number of participating ships. For each ship you rout, convert up to 2 of your dice into [B]. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: UNDIVIDED FAITH
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* You may discard this card at the start of an execution round of combat. If you do, your routed units contribute half of their morale value, rounded up, to your total morale during the resolution step of this combat.

eventsText.title: HEROINE IN THE MAKING
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to move 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister to an enemy world and start combat. While resolving this combat, resolve 1 execution round only and treat the chosen unit as a Living Saint. Destroy it after you resolve the combat.

eventsText.title: INDOMITABLE BELIEF
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* You may discard this card at the start of an execution round of combat. If you do, your units cannot become routed during this execution round.

eventsText.title: FAIT ACCOMPLI
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Before revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to take either 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister from any world and place it on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: INVASION CATHEDRUM DEPLOYMENT
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Battle Sister on a friendly world containing a unit or place 1 free Sister Repentia on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: CRUSADE INTO DARKNESS
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each system containing both friendly and enemy areas, to a maximum of 3.

eventsText.title: INSPIRING ORATOR
eventsText.general: Either gain 1 reinforcement token or gain 1 reinforcement token for each friendly world containing a city.

eventsText.title: ULTIMATE DEVOTION
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a structure or spend 3 materiel to place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a city.

combatText.title: DRIVEN ONWARDS
combatText.general: Your opponent rerolls 2 dice of his choice.
combatText.unit: Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 (S) for each [B] rolled by your opponent while resolving the general ability of this card.

combatText.title: BEACON OF FAITH
combatText.unit: Resolve one of the following: *newline* Sister Repentia: Replace 1 of your Sisters Repentia on this world with 1 free Battle Sister and gain 2 [D]. *newpara* Bastion/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 [M] and 2 (S).

combatText.title: GUIDED RETRIBUTION
combatText.unit: Bastion/Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain either 1 (B) or 1 (S). *newline* Play 1 combat card from your hand. Then discard this card.

combatText.title: HOLY TRINITY
combatText.unit: Bastion/Battle Sister: Gain 2 (B). During the assess damage step of this execution round, your opponent assigns damage 1 at a time.

combatText.title: SANCTIFIED CHARGE
combatText.unit: Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: For each [B], [S], and [M] rolled while resolving the general abilities of this card, gain 1 (B), 1 (S), or 1 [D], respectively.

combatText.title: ZEALOT'S PASSION
combatText.general: Gain 1 (B). *newpara* Force your opponent to lose 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: During this execution round, your opponent cannot rally his units or place reinforcement tokens in this area. *newline* If you are defending, rally 1 of your units.

combatText.title: MARTYRDOM
combatText.general: Convert up to 2 of your [B] into [M].
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: When 1 of your units is destroyed during the assess damage step of this execution round, gain 1 [S]. Damage in excess of that unit's health value is lost.

combatText.title: SPIRITUAL FORTITUDE
combatText.general: Force your oppononent to lose either 1 [B] or 1 [M]. *newpara* If you are defending, your opponent loses 2 (B).

combatText.title: ANGELIC DESCENT
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for each of your unrouted units, to a maximum of 3.
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: At the end of the assess damage step of this execution round, your opponent chooses and destroys 1 of his routed units unless he spends 1 [B].

combatText.title: MARTYR'S IMMOLATION
combatText.general: Gain 3 (S) unless your opponent spends 1 die of his choice. If he does, gain 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Resolve one of the following: *newline* Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Spend 1 [S] to gain 2 (B). *newline* Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: Gain 3 (B). During the assess damage step of this execution round, assign damage to a command level 2 unit first if able. If that unit is destroyed, do not discard your (B) at the end of this execution round.

combatText.title: ARMOURED IN FAITH
combatText.unit: Resolve one of the following: *newline* Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: If you have more [M] than your opponent, your opponent chooses and routs 1 of his units.

combatText.title: DEVASTATING REFRAIN
combatText.general: Gain 1 (B) for each of your opponent's units.
combatText.unit: Resolve one of the following: *newline* Bastion: Gain 1 (S) for each [M] you have. *newline* Sister Repentia/Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 [D].

combatText.title: DIVINE BLESSING
combatText.general: Spend any number of [S] or [M]. For each [S] or [M] you spend, force your opponent to lose 1 [B].

combatText.title: DIVINE SMITING
combatText.general: Either gain 1 [M] or convert up to 2 of your dice into [M].
combatText.unit: Living Saint/Grand Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) for each [M] you have. *newline* During this execution round, none of the [B] are added to offence values.
